name: Abstract and Texture
description: Highlighting the artistic charm of color, texture, or geometric form, often with a strong visual impact and atmosphere.

groups.name: Marble Texture
groups.description: Naturally flowing texture, elegant color and rich change.

groups.name: Wood Grain Structure
groups.description: Displaying the annual ring texture, conveying warmth and simple texture.

groups.name: Ink Blotting
groups.description: The random and artistic pattern formed by the flow and collision of pigments.

groups.name: Geometric Shapes
groups.description: The abstract visual effect composed of points, lines, and surfaces.

groups.name: Kaleidoscope Effect
groups.description: The gorgeous graphic world of multiple symmetrical and rotating patterns.

groups.name: Liquid Flow
groups.description: Color lines that flow and extend like liquid.

groups.name: Mosaic Splicing
groups.description: The effect of color blocks or photo fragments spliced into a complete pattern.

groups.name: Vector Gradient
groups.description: The smooth color transition generated by computer graphics.

groups.name: Pastel Blush
groups.description: The soft and light pastel color tone, giving a light atmosphere.

groups.name: Metal Texture
groups.description: The surface with metallic luster or mottled oxidation traces.

groups.name: Crystal Fragments
groups.description: The refractive and light-shadow effects of crystal clearness.

groups.name: Pixel Style
groups.description: The granular effect simulating low-resolution electronic screens.

groups.name: Pattern Texture
groups.description: Diverse patterns, suitable for decoration or background.

groups.name: Vortex Structure
groups.description: The dynamic picture of layer upon layer rotation and spiral aggregation.

groups.name: Color Ribbon Winding
groups.description: The three-dimensional effect formed by the interlacing and winding of ribbon-like colors.

groups.name: Sand Painting Texture
groups.description: The fine pattern formed by the stacking or flowing of sand particles.

groups.name: Glare Lines
groups.description: The sci-fi atmosphere created by beams, light spots, and dynamic lines.

groups.name: Wave Curves
groups.description: The undulating and continuous curves, full of rhythm and rhythm.

groups.name: Concave and Convex Texture
groups.description: The surface with three-dimensional touch or shadow changes.

groups.name: Water Drops and Ripples
groups.description: The visual elements mainly composed of the ripple spreading on the water surface.

groups.name: Vintage Paper
groups.description: The paper texture with yellowing or old marks, full of age.

groups.name: Smoke Diffusion
groups.description: The misty and light smoke effect, hazy and hazy.

groups.name: Color Ink Mixing
groups.description: The casual changes of multi-color ink blending.

groups.name: Glass Shattering Effect
groups.description: The instant burst feeling created by cracks and fragments.
